title: Highway to Heaven - S01E10 - Help Wanted Angel
description:
10. Help Wanted: Angel   
Community Score
7.4 Good
First aired: 11/21/1984

Martin Lamm is waiting to hear that his script will become a movie, checking with the front desk clerk frequently to 
see if any mail has arrived for him. None ever does.

Martin&#039;s friend, Joey,nails a poster on a pole asking for an "angel" in the sense Martin needs one: someone with the 
money to help him turn his script into a movie. Jonathan and Mark respond to the poster, not knowing what kind of 
angel Joey is looking for.

While Jonathan and Mark are finding out what kind of angel Joey is looking for, a man named Petros arrives with the 
poster in his hand. He loves the script and wants to make the movie. Petros at first scoffs at Martin&#039;s idea of using 
people from the neighborhood as actors in the movie, but Jonathan suggests they might find a star among the 
amateurs, save money and help people at the same time.

Writer: Dan Gordon
Director: Michael Landon
Guest star: Jack Jozefson (Guy), Robert Telford (Preacher), Ed Hooks (Clerk), Jack Bernardi (Jake), Owen Bush 
(Sam), Stella Stevens (Stella), Al Ruscio (Petros), Dennis Fimple (Joey), Jon Lormer (Martin Lamm), Randy Gallion 
(Chewey)
